subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer and Novak Djokovic grinded out victories on Saturday night, but Andy Roddick became the first top-10 seed to fall on the men’s side.
snippet: Roger Federer and Novak Djokovic grinded out victories on Saturday night, but Andy Roddick became the first top-10 seed to fall on the men’s side.
